Label.en: So it was the perfect spot for a palace!
Label.fr: C'était donc l'endroit parfait pour un palais!
Label.es: So it was the perfect spot for a palace!
Label.zh: So it was the perfect spot for a palace!

Label.en: In fact, the French kings lived here all the way up to 1358, when Charles V moved to a fancier palace in the Louvre!
Label.fr: En fait les rois français y ont vécu jusqu'en 1358, année où  Charles V a emménagé au palais plus branché du Louvre!
Label.es: In fact, the French kings lived here all the way up to 1358, when Charles V moved to a fancier palace in the Louvre!
Label.zh: In fact, the French kings lived here all the way up to 1358, when Charles V moved to a fancier palace in the Louvre!

Label.en: They say he moved as he no longer felt safe, likely due to multiple advisors being murdered in front of him!
Label.fr: Il paraît qu'il ne s'y sentais plus en sécurité, probablement après avoir vu plusieurs conseillers assassinés sous ses yeux !
Label.es: They say he moved as he no longer felt safe, likely due to multiple advisors being murdered in front of him!
Label.zh: They say he moved as he no longer felt safe, likely due to multiple advisors being murdered in front of him!

Label.en: After he had left, he appointed a concierge to run the old palace, which is where it gets its current name from!
Label.fr: Après son départ, il a nommé un concierge pour s'occuper du vieux palais, qui s'est ainsi retrouvé avec un nouveau nom !
Label.es: After he had left, he appointed a concierge to run the old palace, which is where it gets its current name from!
Label.zh: After he had left, he appointed a concierge to run the old palace, which is where it gets its current name from!

Label.en: After he had left, he appointed a concierge to run the old palace, which is where it gets its current name from!!
Label.fr: Après son départ, il a nommé un concierge pour s'occuper du vieux palais, qui s'est ainsi retrouvé avec un nouveau nom !
Label.es: After he had left, he appointed a concierge to run the old palace, which is where it gets its current name from!!
Label.zh: After he had left, he appointed a concierge to run the old palace, which is where it gets its current name from!!
